title: How to Make Vegan Stuffed Mushrooms

steps.headline: Coat the baking pan or cookie sheet with cooking spray and preheat the oven to 375 °F (191 °C).
Heat the olive oil in a sauté pan over medium heat.
steps.description: Add the rest of the ingredients specified in the ingredients section to the heat. Sauté for 7 to 10 minutes.

steps.headline: Fill each mushroom cap with an equal amount of the mixture.
Place the mushrooms onto the baking sheet, and bake them for 30 to 45 minutes.
Remove the mushrooms from the oven when the stuffing begins to turn a golden brown color.
Serve hot or at room temperature.

text: Coat the baking pan or cookie sheet with cooking spray and preheat the oven to 375 °F (191 °C).  Heat the olive oil in a sauté pan over medium heat. Add the rest of the ingredients specified in the ingredients section to the heat. Sauté for 7 to 10 minutes. Fill each mushroom cap with an equal amount of the mixture.  Place the mushrooms onto the baking sheet, and bake them for 30 to 45 minutes.  Remove the mushrooms from the oven when the stuffing begins to turn a golden brown color.  Serve hot or at room temperature.
